statements: SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT id, vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE patch_status = TRUE;
SELECT vulnerability_name FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity = 'High';
SELECT id, vulnerability_name, patch_date FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity IN ('Low', 'Medium');
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity FROM vulnerabilities WHERE patch_status=TRUE ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='Low' AND patch_status=FALSE;
SELECT id, vulnerability_name FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity='Medium';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY patch_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level > 3;
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_name FROM vulnerabilities JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.patch_id = patches.patch_id;
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_description LIKE '%critical%';
SELECT vulnerability_id, patch_id FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY vulnerability_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level > 5
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY severity_level DESC
SELECT vulnerabilities.vulnerability_name, patches.patch_name FROM vulnerabilities JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.patch_id = patches.vulnerability_id
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE patch_description LIKE '%security%'
SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_name FROM vulnerabilities INNER JOIN patches ON vulnerabilities.patch_id = patches.vulnerability_id
SELECT * FROM vulnerability;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_name, description, affected_system FROM vulnerability WHERE patch_status = 'Pending';
SELECT patch_name, patch_version, release_date FROM patch WHERE vulnerability_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT manager_name, manager_email FROM patch_management;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerability;
SELECT * FROM patch WHERE patch_version = '1.0';
SELECT description FROM vulnerability WHERE severity_level = 'High';
SELECT vulnerability_id, patch_name, patch_version FROM patch ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM patch_management WHERE manager_email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities;
SELECT vulnerability_name, severity_level FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level='High';
SELECT description, affected_system FROM vulnerabilities WHERE published_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patch_name, description, patch_date FROM patches ORDER BY patch_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerability_tracking WHERE patch_status='Pending' ORDER BY due_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY severity_level DESC, published_date DESC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM vulnerabilities WHERE severity_level = 'High';

SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_name, description FROM vulnerabilities JOIN vulnerability_patches ON vulnerabilities.id = vulnerability_patches.vulnerability_id JOIN patches ON vulnerability_patches.patch_id = patches.id;

SELECT vulnerability_name, COUNT(vulnerability_patches.patch_id) AS patch_count FROM vulnerabilities LEFT JOIN vulnerability_patches ON vulnerabilities.id = vulnerability_patches.vulnerability_id GROUP BY vulnerability_name;

SELECT vulnerability_name, patch_status FROM vulnerabilities JOIN vulnerability_tracking ON vulnerabilities.id = vulnerability_tracking.vulnerability_id WHERE patch_status IS NULL ORDER BY vulnerability_name ASC;
SELECT vulnerability_name, cvss_score FROM vulnerabilities
SELECT * FROM patches WHERE applied = true
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM devices ORDER BY device_type ASC
SELECT vulnerability_name, release_date FROM vulnerabilities WHERE cvss_score > 7
SELECT patch_id, device_id, patch_date FROM patch_history
SELECT vulnerability_id, vulnerability_name, cvss_score FROM vulnerabilities WHERE cvss_score > 7.5
SELECT patch_name, patch_date, applied FROM patches WHERE patch_date > '2021-01-01'
SELECT device_name, device_type, ip_address FROM devices WHERE device_type = 'Router' OR device_type = 'Switch'
SELECT vulnerability_name, description FROM vulnerabilities ORDER BY release_date DESC
SELECT device_name, ip_address FROM devices WHERE ip_address LIKE '192.168.%'
